TestCase.name: testAggregationOnProctime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[EXPR$0]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[long], select=[long, MIN(proctime) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[long, PROCTIME(proctime) AS proctime], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testAggregationOnRowtime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[TMP_0]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[long], select=[long, MIN(rowtime) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[CAST(rowtime) AS rowtime, long], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupingOnProctime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[EXPR$0]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[proctime], select=[proctime, COUNT(long) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[proctime]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[PROCTIME(proctime) AS proctime, long], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testGroupingOnRowtime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[TMP_0]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[rowtime], select=[rowtime, COUNT(long) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[rowtime]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[long, CAST(rowtime) AS rowtime], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testMultiWindow
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[TMP_2, long, TMP_3]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[long], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w2, 'newrowtime, 1000.millis)], properties=[TMP_2], select=[long, SUM(int) AS TMP_3, end('w2) AS TMP_2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[long, TMP_1 AS int, TMP_0 AS newrowtime], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[long], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, 'rowtime, 100.millis)], properties=[TMP_0], select=[long, SUM(int) AS TMP_1, rowtime('w) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSelectAll
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime, long, int, PROCTIME(proctime) AS proctime]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testTableFunction
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime, PROCTIME(proctime) AS proctime, s]) StreamExecCorrelate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$plan$TimeIndicatorConversionTest$TableFunc$2a5c4fdb77f562a289f5576111ce15bb(CAST($0):TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, PROCTIME($3), '')], correlate=[table(TableFunc(CAST(rowtime),PROCTIME(proctime),''))], select=[rowtime,proctime,s], rowType=[RecordType(TIME ATTRIBUTE(ROWTIME) rowtime, TIME ATTRIBUTE(PROCTIME) proctime, VARCHAR(65536) s)], joinType=[INNER]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testWindowWithAggregationOnRowtime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[EXPR$0, long]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[long], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w$, 'rowtime, 100.millis)], select=[long, MIN(rowtime0) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[long, rowtime, CAST(rowtime) AS rowtime0], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testWindow
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[TMP_0 AS rowtime, long, TMP_1]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[long], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w, 'rowtime, 100.millis)], properties=[TMP_0], select=[long, SUM(int) AS TMP_1, end('w) AS TMP_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testWindowWithAggregationOnRowtimeWithHaving
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[EXPR$0, long], where=[=(EXTRACT(FLAG(QUARTER), CAST(w$end)), 1)]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[long], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w$, 'rowtime, 1000.millis)], properties=[w$start, w$end, w$rowtime, w$proctime], select=[long, MIN(rowtime0) AS EXPR$0, start('w$) AS w$start, end('w$) AS w$end, rowtime('w$) AS w$rowtime, proctime('w$) AS w$proctime]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[long, rowtime, CAST(rowtime) AS rowtime0], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testWindowSql
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[w$end AS rowtime, long, EXPR$2]) StreamExecGroupWindowAggregate(groupBy=[long], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w$, 'rowtime, 100.millis)], properties=[w$start, w$end, w$rowtime, w$proctime], select=[long, SUM(int) AS EXPR$2, start('w$) AS w$start, end('w$) AS w$end, rowtime('w$) AS w$rowtime, proctime('w$) AS w$proctime]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[long]]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
